documentation.text: @dev Check if user is enrolled in course
@dev Check if user completed specific module
@dev Get all completion data for a user+course (gas efficient)

devdoc.details: Ultra gas-efficient course enrollment and progress tracking Uses bit packing and minimal storage for maximum efficiency Target: <0.1 CELO per transaction

params.moduleIndex: Module index (0-254, max 255 modules per course)

completeModulesBatch(uint256,uint8[]).details: Batch complete multiple modules (ultra gas efficient)

params.moduleIndices: Array of module indices to complete

getUserCourseData(address,uint256).details: Get all completion data for a user+course (gas efficient)

isEnrolled(address,uint256).details: Check if user is enrolled in course

isModuleCompleted(address,uint256,uint8).details: Check if user completed specific module
